name: TD-Clickers
description:
TD-Clickers is a clicker game with tower defense game type elements. Made for LibGDX June Jam.
The theme was 'Tower Defense without Towers'

Music : Kevin McLeod - www.incompetech.com

Game Art : https://craftpix.net/

How to play:

Use W, A, S, D to move the camera.
Click on monsters to deal damage to them.
Prevent monsters from reaching your castle.
You can upgrade and place additional auto-clickers.
To upgrade existing auto-clickers press-right click on them.
Have fun!
